attributes.action: THE TOTAL ABOLITION OF THE ABORTION ACT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to ban abortion in all cases without any exception whatsoever , which includes the banning of abortion in genuine cases of rape and in cases of  genuine medical risk to the mother.To make it a criminal offence to assist in any forms of abortion in the UK with mandatory prison sentences of 5-10 years for anyone involved in abortion practices in the UK .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
